servinfo.title: Oil Control Valve Removal and Installation

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Timing Chain Cover Components:For M16A Engine with VVT

s1.ptxt: Drain engine oil referring to Engine Oil and Filter Change .
Remove P/S pump and A/C compressor drive belt referring to P/S Pump and A/C Compressor (If Equipped) Drive Belt Removal and Installation for M16 Engine Model .
With hose connected, detach P/S pump from its bracket referring to P/S Pump Removal and Installation for M16 Engine Model .

attention2.ptxt: Suspend removed P/S pump at a place where no damage will be caused during removal and installation of engine assembly.

s1.ptxt: Remove oil gallery pipe No.1 (1) and oil control valve (2) from timing chain cover (3).

ptxt.intxrefpoff: Oil Control Valve Inspection:For M16A Engine with VVT

s1.ptxt: Install new O-ring (4) to oil control valve.
Install oil control valve to timing chain cover.
Install oil gallery pipe No.1 with new copper washers (5) to timing chain cover.
Install P/S pump to its bracket referring to P/S Pump Removal and Installation for M16 Engine Model .
Install P/S pump and A/C compressor drive belt referring to P/S Pump and A/C Compressor (If Equipped) Drive Belt Removal and Installation for M16 Engine Model .
Adjust P/S pump and A/C compressor drive belt tension referring to P/S Pump and A/C Compressor (If Equipped) Drive Belt Inspection and Adjustment for M16 Engine Model .
Refill engine with engine oil referring to Engine Oil and Filter Change .
